text:
If	you	find	that	
the water is less than 70C, we 
recommend that you stop using 
the machine. You may also wish 
to contact the manufacturer, 
local Trading Standards 
Department or Citizens Advice 
to report that your machine is 
faulty.

feeding/how-to-make-up-a-feed

different	brands	of	infant	
formula milk available in 
the shops. While baby 
milk companies may claim 
their formula is closest to
